text: What is college worth?//t.co/x0WF1qMwaw//t.co/R06qBBAJY4

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: Thanks @DavidBleySea. This question of value needs to be addressed, and we feel that it needs to be addressed urgently! Very much looking forward to seeing how we can apply our findings right here in the PNW.//t.co/OHLLibQXFl

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: @sewsueme @PresMillieG Eek is right! If this value commission is going to be as much for students and their families as it is for the institutions, we must have them represented at the table. And @ArkansasState's @atalejandro344 and @harvard's @saharmzadeh are two great examples!

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: And they all can expect this commission to first propose a definition of value and find an approach to measure it. I'm as excited as you are, @AllanGolston!//t.co/ES3yNan4W7

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: This data will be beneficial to families, students, institutions, and even @GatesUS! We are using the outputs from this value commission to make investment decisions at the foundation.//t.co/NBkE4qmUPw

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: Yes!//t.co/FECeo8OchB

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: What is the value of #education after high school? Today @GatesUS with @IHEPtweets launches the Commission on the Value of Postsecondary Education which I'm co-chairing with @PresMillieG to propose a definition of value and an approach for measuring that value. #HigherEd//t.co/WZ6aos8bmY

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: Sometimes scientific work changes everything - this is one of those times- the insight that we can use our own immune systems to fight off cancer opens up so many opportunities to do better for patients- worthy of #nobelprize2018 !//t.co/Kv4RQJkIYP

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: Dr. James Allison and Dr. Tasuku Honjo's immunotherapy discovery uses our own body's defenses to destroy cancer. Today's @NobelPrize award is a significant leap toward ending cancer as we know it and paving the path to a cure. Congratulations and thank you.

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: The science behind this year's Medicine #NobelPrize is truly G-Wiz: overturning cancer's ability to turn down your immune system; "taking off the brakes". More importantly, while early days for the clinical work, spectacular results for some patients with cancer.//t.co/NgUKbqQXwp

name: Dr. Sue Desmond-Hellmann
text: Congrats to Allison and Honjo- just awarded Medicine or Physiology #nobelprize2018 Their research showed that releasing the brakes could allow patient's own immune system to treat their cancer. //t.co/2bySZ1B8Xv
